result.title: Offering free lessons in competitive programming over Skype
result.content:
Hello everyone,

I want to improve my spoken English, and therefore I have decided to provide free programming lessons over Skype. Please look at this post on my blog for more information.

http://mdotsabouri.blogspot.com/2014/12/offering-help-with-algorithms-and.html

Thanks!

P.S. As I rarely participate in Codeforces contests, my rating does not reflect my actual abilities. I have advanced to the ACM-ICPC World Finals twice, and I was red in TopCoder for a while, so please don't judge me based on my Codeforces rating. :)

http://community.topcoder.com/tc?module=MemberProfile&cr=22898483
